title: CorTalk: Vesicular Conversations in Parkinson's Disease
description: Dr. Charmaine Lang (Centre for Human Genetics, University of Oxford) researches the cellular and molecular mechanisms of Parkinsonâ€™s disease using patient-derived induced pluripotent stem cells. Specifically, she is interested in the communication between astrocytes and dopaminergic neurones and aims to elucidate whether these signals are supportive or destructive in neurodegeneration.
